Feb. 6, 1988 D Yeovil Entertainment
Yeovil Entertainment 0 Entertainments Contest Yeovil Entertainment Contest yeovil-entertainment
Octagon Theatre, Yeovil, Somerset, England, UK Best soloist - Steven Mead (euphonium) Desford. The three bands without conductors or draw numbers do not appear in contest programme which shows the following - Parc and Dare, Nigel Seaman draw 7, Bournemouth Concert, Derek Dawson draw 8, Flowers, Brian Webber draw 11. Info - Dave Holland(dutchy)
